com.adobe.cq.social.messaging.client.api

Interface MessageBoxSocialComponent<P extends MessageSocialComponent,C extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommentCollection<P,C>, SocialCollectionComponent, SocialComponent

    public interface MessageBoxSocialComponent<P extends MessageSocialComponent,C extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>
extends CommentCollection<P,C>
    Represents a Messaging MessageBox.
